11.content:
Brad woke up after having a strange dream, but as soon as he tried to remember what it was, he had forgotten it. He glanced over at his clock, it was 3:12 a.m. He got up groggily heading for his bathroom. As he walked, he tried to force his brain to remember what he was dreaming, but nothing came to his head. In the bathroom he took a piss and stepped in front of the mirror. When he saw his reflection, the dream came back to him. He was at a beach wearing a speedo, but instead of him being muscular, he was fat!
"Wierd." he said to himself. He admired his angular face and wondered, what would it be like to be fat? He pushed the though out of his head and scratched his shortly cut blonde hair.
He was heading out of the bathroom when suddenly, there was a bright white flash came from the bathroom window. After a moment being stunned from the light, he ran to the window to see...
11.title: Brad Pitt

13.content:
Russell Crowe Long gone are the days where Russell could pull of a slim neo nazi like in his first real breakout role, Romper Stomper. Over the years Russel has been more and more known for growing a well trimmed beard and putting on some weight. Sure he's been muscular for a couple of roles, but those delicious craft tables on set, there's also his attempts to stop smoking which lead to his peak weight of 250 pounds sporting a nice big gut and a double chin no one could ignore. Russell kind of liked having muscular Dave Bautista joke and poke his belly. In fact Russell kind of got off on it.
Sadly Russell had to lose the weight for roles like Noah and Man of Steel and got back down to under 200. But since then Russell has been slowly regaining the weight and has been finding it harder and harder to keep the weight off.

Where do we find Russell?
13.title: Russell Crowe
